location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to The Right Honourable, The Lord Amherst, Governor General of India, Fort William

mods.abstract: Letter regarding bills drawn by Colonel John Macdonald on account of the Mission to Persia which have been endorsed by Colonel Stannus in his own favour on his Lordship's Supreme board. The letter includes a list of the bills endorsed.
